definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: It is from areas of Africa, west and south Asia.
sentences.chinese: 它們來自非洲，西南亞等地區。

sentences.english: A country of southwest Asia at the southern tip of the Arabian peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 西南亞一國家，位於阿拉伯半島南端。

sentences.english: Next comes Africa south of the Sahara, followed by Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 接下來是非洲的撒哈拉南部，然後是西南亞。

sentences.english: With the cultural dissemination, other ethnic groups in west Asia and southwest Asia adopted cuneiform .
sentences.chinese: 楔形文字傳播的地區主要在西亞和西南亞。
